attributes.action: NO MORE DARTFORD CROSSING TOLL CHARGE
attributes.additional_details:
The Dartford Crossing is this country's biggest bottle neck. The queue regularly reaches back to j28 on the Essex side and similar queues form on the Kent side. Widening the Essex stretch of the M25 will not remove this awful bottle neck.

Removing the bottle neck (toll booths) will reduce carbon emissions, save companies money and increase journey times.

rejection.details: There are petitions both about removing the toll booths (and using alternative toll collection mechanisms) and about abolishing the tolls altogether.
